verses.verse: וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech went אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish a man מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit of the house לֵוִ֑י <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi; of Levi וַיִּקַּ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- [to wife] a daughter לֵוִֽי׃ <S%H3878><s%> le-Vi. of Levi

וַתַּ֥הַר <S%H2029><s%> vat-Ta-har conceived הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah And the woman וַתֵּ֣לֶד <S%H3205><s%> vat-Te-led and bare בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> Ben; a son וַתֵּ֤רֶא <S%H7200><s%> vat-Te-re and when she saw אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-To כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov him that he [was a] goodly ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, she וַֽתִּצְפְּנֵ֖הוּ <S%H6845><s%> vat-titz-pe-Ne-hu [child] she hid שְׁלֹשָׁ֥ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah him three יְרָחִֽים׃ <S%H3391><s%> ye-ra-Chim. months

וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no יָכְלָ֣ה <S%H3201><s%> ya-che-Lah And when she could עוֹד֮ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od not longer הַצְּפִינוֹ֒ <S%H6845><s%> hatz-tze-fi-No hide וַתִּֽקַּֽח־ <S%H3947><s%> vat-tik-kach- him she took לוֹ֙ lo תֵּ֣בַת <S%H8392><s%> Te-vat for him an ark גֹּ֔מֶא <S%H1573><s%> Go-me, of bulrushes וַתַּחְמְרָ֥ה <S%H2560><s%> vat-tach-me-Rah and daubed בַחֵמָ֖ר <S%H2564><s%> va-che-Mar it with slime וּבַזָּ֑פֶת <S%H2203><s%> u-vaz-Za-fet; and with pitch וַתָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vat-Ta-sem and put בָּהּ֙ bah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיֶּ֔לֶד <S%H3206><s%> hai-Ye-led, the child וַתָּ֥שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vat-Ta-sem therein and she laid בַּסּ֖וּף <S%H5488><s%> bas-Suf [it] in the flags עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> se-Fat brink הַיְאֹֽר׃ <S%H2975><s%> hay-'Or. by the river's

וַתֵּתַצַּ֥ב <S%H3320><s%> vat-te-tatz-Tzav stood אֲחֹת֖וֹ <S%H269><s%> a-cho-To And his sister מֵרָחֹ֑ק <S%H7350><s%> me-ra-Chok; afar off לְדֵעָ֕ה <S%H3045><s%> le-de-'Ah to wit מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what יֵּעָשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> ye-'a-Seh what would be done לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וַתֵּ֤רֶד <S%H3381><s%> vat-Te-red came down בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- And the daughter פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh of Pharaoh לִרְחֹ֣ץ <S%H7364><s%> lir-Chotz to wash עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- at הַיְאֹ֔ר <S%H2975><s%> hay-'Or, [herself] at the river וְנַעֲרֹתֶ֥יהָ <S%H5291><s%> ve-na-'a-ro-Tei-ha and her maidens הֹלְכֹ֖ת <S%H1980><s%> ho-le-Chot walked עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and יַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> yad side הַיְאֹ֑ר <S%H2975><s%> hay-'Or; along by the river's וַתֵּ֤רֶא <S%H7200><s%> vat-Te-re and when she saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַתֵּבָה֙ <S%H8392><s%> hat-te-Vah the ark בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch among הַסּ֔וּף <S%H5488><s%> has-Suf, the flags וַתִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> vat-tish-Lach she sent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲמָתָ֖הּ <S%H519><s%> 'a-ma-Tah her maid וַתִּקָּחֶֽהָ <S%H3947><s%> vat-tik-ka-Che-ha to fetch

וַתִּפְתַּח֙ <S%H6605><s%> vat-tif-Tach And when she had opened וַתִּרְאֵ֣הוּ <S%H7200><s%> vat-tir-'E-hu [it] she saw אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיֶּ֔לֶד <S%H3206><s%> hai-Ye-led, the child וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- and behold נַ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> Na-'ar and behold the babe בֹּכֶ֑ה <S%H1058><s%> bo-Cheh; wept וַתַּחְמֹ֣ל <S%H2550><s%> vat-tach-Mol And she had compassion עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, on וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer on him and said מִיַּלְדֵ֥י <S%H3206><s%> mi-yal-Dei children הָֽעִבְרִ֖ים <S%H5680><s%> ha-'iv-Rim This [is one] of the Hebrews' זֶֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> Zeh. This

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer Then said אֲחֹתוֹ֮ <S%H269><s%> a-cho-To his sister אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- daughter פַּרְעֹה֒ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh to Pharaoh's הַאֵלֵ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ha-'e-Lech, go וְקָרָ֤אתִי <S%H7121><s%> ve-ka-Ra-ti and call לָךְ֙ loCh אִשָּׁ֣ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah women מֵינֶ֔קֶת <S%H3243><s%> mei-Ne-ket, to thee a nurse מִ֖ן <S%H4480><s%> min from הָעִבְרִיֹּ֑ת <S%H5680><s%> ha-'iv-ri-Yot; of the Hebrew וְתֵינִ֥ק <S%H3243><s%> ve-tei-Nik that she may nurse לָ֖ךְ lach אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיָּֽלֶד׃ <S%H3206><s%> hai-Ya-led. the child

וַתֹּֽאמֶר־ <S%H559><s%> vat-to-mer- said לָ֥הּ lah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- daughter פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh And Pharaoh's לֵ֑כִי <S%H1980><s%> Le-chi; to her Go וַתֵּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H1980><s%> vat-Te-lech went הָֽעַלְמָ֔ה <S%H5959><s%> ha-'al-Mah, And the maid וַתִּקְרָ֖א <S%H7121><s%> vat-tik-Ra and called אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֵ֥ם <S%H517><s%> 'em mother הַיָּֽלֶד׃ <S%H3206><s%> hai-Ya-led. the child's

וַתֹּ֧אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said לָ֣הּ lah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- daughter פַּרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, And Pharaoh's הֵילִ֜יכִי <S%H1980><s%> hei-Li-chi to her Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַיֶּ֤לֶד <S%H3206><s%> hai-Ye-led this child הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this וְהֵינִקִ֣הוּ <S%H3243><s%> ve-hei-ni-Ki-hu and nurse לִ֔י Li, וַאֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I אֶתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> 'et-Ten it for me and I will give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׂכָרֵ֑ךְ <S%H7939><s%> se-cha-Rech; [thee] thy wages וַתִּקַּ֧ח <S%H3947><s%> vat-tik-Kach took הָאִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> ha-'ish-Shah And the woman הַיֶּ֖לֶד <S%H3206><s%> hai-Ye-led the child וַתְּנִיקֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H5134><s%> vat-te-ni-Ke-hu. and nursed

וַיִגְדַּ֣ל <S%H1431><s%> va-yig-Dal grew הַיֶּ֗לֶד <S%H3206><s%> hai-Ye-led, And the child וַתְּבִאֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vat-te-vi-'E-hu and she brought לְבַת־ <S%H1323><s%> le-vat- daughter פַּרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh, him unto Pharaoh's וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> vay-hi- became לָ֖הּ lah לְבֵ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> le-Ven; and he became her son וַתִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> vat-tik-Ra And she called שְׁמוֹ֙ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo his name מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, Moses וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer and she said כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki Because מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- out הַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> ham-Ma-yim him out of the water מְשִׁיתִֽהוּ׃ <S%H4871><s%> me-shi-Ti-hu. Because I drew

וַיְהִ֣י׀ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בַּיָּמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> bai-ya-Mim And it came to pass in those days הָהֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> ha-Hem, those וַיִּגְדַּ֤ל <S%H1431><s%> vai-yig-Dal was grown מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh when Moses וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze that he went out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav, unto his brethren וַיַּ֖רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar and looked בְּסִבְלֹתָ֑ם <S%H5450><s%> be-siv-lo-Tam; on their burdens וַיַּרְא֙ <S%H7200><s%> vai-yaR and he spied אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish an מִצְרִ֔י <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ri, Egyptian מַכֶּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> mak-Keh smiting אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> 'ish- a עִבְרִ֖י <S%H5680><s%> 'iv-Ri an Hebrew מֵאֶחָֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> me-'e-Chav. one of his brethren

וַיִּ֤פֶן <S%H6437><s%> vai-Yi-fen And he looked כֹּה֙ <S%H3541><s%> koh this way וָכֹ֔ה <S%H3541><s%> va-Choh, and that way וַיַּ֖רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar and when he saw כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein there אִ֑ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'Ish; that [there was] no man וַיַּךְ֙ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yaCh he slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּצְרִ֔י <S%H4713><s%> ham-mitz-Ri, the Egyptian וַֽיִּטְמְנֵ֖הוּ <S%H2934><s%> vai-yit-me-Ne-hu and hid בַּחֽוֹל׃ <S%H2344><s%> ba-Chol. him in the sand

וַיֵּצֵא֙ <S%H3318><s%> vai-ye-Tze And when he went out בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, the second וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> she-nei- behold two אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim he עִבְרִ֖ים <S%H5680><s%> 'iv-Rim of the Hebrews נִצִּ֑ים <S%H5327><s%> nitz-Tzim; strove וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer together and he said לָֽרָשָׁ֔ע <S%H7563><s%> la-ra-Sha', to him that did the wrong לָ֥מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Lam-mah Why תַכֶּ֖ה <S%H5221><s%> tak-Keh Wherefore smitest רֵעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7453><s%> re-'E-cha. brother

וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> Vai-yo-mer And he said מִ֣י <S%H4310><s%> mi Who שָֽׂמְךָ֞ <S%H7760><s%> sa-me-Cha Who made לְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> le-'Ish thee שַׂ֤ר <S%H8269><s%> sar a prince וְשֹׁפֵט֙ <S%H8199><s%> ve-sho-Fet and a judge עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu, over הַלְהָרְגֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H2026><s%> hal-ha-re-Ge-ni thou to kill אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah are you אֹמֵ֔ר <S%H559><s%> 'o-Mer, over us;intendest כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher you הָרַ֖גְתָּ <S%H2026><s%> ha-Rag-ta me as thou killedst אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּצְרִ֑י <S%H4713><s%> ham-mitz-Ri; Egyptian וַיִּירָ֤א <S%H3372><s%> vai-yi-Ra feared מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh Moses וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-Mar, and said אָכֵ֖ן <S%H403><s%> 'a-Chen Surely נוֹדַ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> no-Da' is known הַדָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var. this thing

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' heard פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh Now when Pharaoh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַדָּבָ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var this thing הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, of this וַיְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <S%H1245><s%> vay-vak-Kesh he sought לַהֲרֹ֣ג <S%H2026><s%> la-ha-Rog to slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; Moses וַיִּבְרַ֤ח <S%H1272><s%> vai-yiv-Rach fled מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh But Moses מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from the face פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh, of Pharaoh וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev and dwelt בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> be-'e-retz- in the land מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan of Midian וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev and he sat down עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- by הַבְּאֵֽר׃ <S%H875><s%> hab-be-'Er. by a well

וּלְכֹהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> u-le-cho-Hen Now the priest מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan of Midian שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' had seven בָּנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> ba-Not; daughters וַתָּבֹ֣אנָה <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Vo-nah and they came וַתִּדְלֶ֗נָה <S%H1802><s%> vat-tid-Le-nah, and drew וַתְּמַלֶּ֙אנָה֙ <S%H4390><s%> vat-te-mal-Le-nah [water] and filled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָ֣רְהָטִ֔ים <S%H7298><s%> ha-re-ha-Tim, the troughs לְהַשְׁק֖וֹת <S%H8248><s%> le-hash-Kot to water צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> tzon flock אֲבִיהֶֽן׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vi-Hen. their father's

וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u came הָרֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> ha-ro-'Im And the shepherds וַיְגָרְשׁ֑וּם <S%H1644><s%> vay-ga-re-Shum; and drove them away וַיָּ֤קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom stood up מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh but Moses וַיּ֣וֹשִׁעָ֔ן <S%H3467><s%> vai-Yoo-shi-'An, and helped וַיַּ֖שְׁקְ <S%H8248><s%> vai-Yashk them and watered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צֹאנָֽם׃ <S%H6629><s%> tzo-Nam. their flock
